title: Leblanc
body: I want a person with good burst damage, my friends tell me to get Leblanc, do you agree or do you recommend someone else.{{champion:7}}

replies.body: she doesn't really fall of, her damage is relevant all game its just the problem is its single target.

> [{quoted}](name=specter424,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=yOcHOMgI,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-08-13T05:24:07.067+0000)
>
> she doesn't really fall of, her damage is relevant all game its just the problem is its single target.

Mmm, I didn't mean her damage falls off; just her effectiveness. According to Champion GG, her winrate tanks to ~47% after 25min. This is due to people starting to group up, so LeBlanc is not really able to dive in and take out high priority targets without getting exploded.
I may not get Leblanc if she turns really bad after the rework

if you want to play a burst champion with the ability to get the F out of dodge after securing 2+ kills in a 5v5 teamfight or chase better then a Zac on steroids, than she is for you. On the downside, you will be hated by the other team for even locking Leblanc in lel
